availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

body.p: Jefferson County, Kentucky, farmer, guerrilla. Kentucky native. Son of Gideon Walker. Son of Eliza Walker. Farmer in Jefferson County in 1850. Confederate guerrilla.

ab.bibl:
Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Jefferson County, District 2, p. 233
KYR-0001-004-1941
KYR-0001-004-1942
Hulbert, Matthew Christopher, The Ghosts of Guerrilla Memory: How Civil War Bushwhackers Became Gunslingers in the American West (Athens: The University of Georgia Press, 2016), 268n15
